abilities.description: A powerful lightning attack that strikes down from above with devastating force.
Enel's ultimate technique that creates massive thunderclouds which rain down devastating lightning strikes across entire islands to destroy them completely.
Enel's ability to transform into and control massive amounts of electrical energy.

keyMoments.title: God's Judgment Defeats Sanji
keyMoments.description: Enel uses his God's Judgment attack to strike down Sanji who sacrificed himself to protect Nami.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the overwhelming power of the Goro Goro no Mi against non-insulated opponents.

keyMoments.title: Deathpiea Technique Debut
keyMoments.description: Enel debuts his ultimate attack Deathpiea, using his lightning powers to create massive thunderclouds that rain destruction across Skypiea.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the true devastating potential of the Goro Goro no Mi when used to its full extent, capable of destroying entire islands.

weaknesses.description: Rubber is a natural insulator that completely negates the Goro Goro no Mi's lightning abilities.

reveals.information: Deathpiea technique debut - ultimate island-destroying lightning attack
